column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We got the deep dish mushroom with the butter crust
column3: and to finish off--the pan chocolate chip cookie. The spinach bread is excellent and comes with marinara sauce for dipping.  What I like most about the pizza was the amount of cheese. It was oozing off
column4: but not in ridiculous amounts.  I think that I will rank Lou's as my #3 favorite  deep dish in Chicago
column5: behind Gino's East and Peqouds (see review below!).
